description:
A mysterious, long-nosed gentleman who resides in the Velvet Room. Igor`s purpose is to provide insight to the protagonists regarding their powers, emotional bonds, and possible dangers that await them in their journey. It is revealed by http://anidb.net/ch37510 [Margaret] that Igor creates the Velvet Room himself and bases its appearance on who the protagonist is at the time, as well as their situation.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Igor
